data.title: OnTheMove Software | Company and Product Overview
data.meta_description: The mission, ethos, background and history of OnTheMove Software and the Customer Systems Group
data.text:
Company Overview

OnTheMove

OnTheMove, from the company of the same name, allows enterprises to create optimized, intuitive UIs for transactions implemented in business applications such as Veeva, Salesforce and Siebel. Our customers run OnTheMove Apps on PCs, Macs, tablets and phones.

OnTheMove is particularly well suited to complex, on the road data capture scenarios especially where there is a requirement to work without internet access. Proven and mature, OnTheMove is in use by Fortune 500 companies and other organizations across a wide range of industries and use cases including:

Pharma / BioTechnology – especially Clinical Trial Visit Reporting

Field Service

CPG – Instore Visits

Sales

We have a set of pre-configured vertical applications for specific business applications and processes.

OnTheMove Apps can be deployed SaaS or On-Premise. The tooling dramatically simplifies the definition of UIs and business processes compared to traditional hard core web development, but with no loss of flexibility.

Our services help organizations to implement and be successful with OnTheMove.

Our global HQ is in Bracknell, Berkshire, UK and our US office is in Indianapolis, Indiana. We operate throughout Europe, the USA and further afield.

Customer Systems
